docs.snippet: This evening's opening is the comedy called "Out From Under," the work of John Walter Kelly and this season's second production by Brock Pemberton. The central character is a Midwestern newspaper editor.
docs.lead_paragraph: This evening's opening is the comedy called "Out From Under," the work of John Walter Kelly and this season's second production by Brock Pemberton. The central character is a Midwestern newspaper editor.

headline.main: 'OUT FROM UNDER' WILL OPEN TONIGHT; Pemberton's Second Offering of Season to Feature Ruth Weston, John Alexander BROADHURST GETS REVUE 'Keep Off the Grass' Is Slated to Open May 22--Three Attractions to Depart

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, May 4 --Documents have been presented to the Ministry of Defense to show that the Nazi party known in Germany as N.S.D.A.P. is operating in Uruguay with obvious purpose of organizing German groups, ...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, May 4 --Documents have been presented to the Ministry of Defense to show that the Nazi party known in Germany as N.S.D.A.P. is operating in Uruguay with obvious purpose of organizing German groups, ...
docs.abstract: Data charges German groups with creating anti-Semitic sentiment and planning totalitarian revolution

headline.main: ORGANIZING FOR REICH IN URUGUAY ALLEGED; Data Charging Nazi Revolutionary Aims Presented

docs.snippet: DURING his tour of South America, starting this month, Artur Rubinstein, pianist, as vice chairman of  the national committee of the Paderewski Fund for Polish Relief, will undertake a special mission as the fund's representative in the southern...
docs.lead_paragraph: DURING his tour of South America, starting this month, Artur Rubinstein, pianist, as vice chairman of the national committee of the Paderewski Fund for Polish Relief, will undertake a special mission as the fund's representative in the southern continent.

docs.snippet: MENTION was made last week in this pillar of news and gossip that the rumors of Deanna Durbin's engage  ment for the Metropolitan Opera had taken wing again.

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, May 5 --The dismantling of the Admiral Graf Spee, scuttled German pocket battleship, has begun under the closest possible secrecy and is proceeding under great difficulty.
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, May 5 --The dismantling of the Admiral Graf Spee, scuttled German pocket battleship, has begun under the closest possible secrecy and is proceeding under great difficulty.
docs.abstract: Brit experts dismantle battleship Adm Graf Spee in Montevideo harbor

headline.main: British Experts Are Dismantling Graf Spee; Many Shells Are in Unexploded Magazine
